negotiator.parties

Class RandomCounterOfferNegotiationParty

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty
      • negotiator.parties.RandomCounterOfferNegotiationParty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NegotiationParty

    public class RandomCounterOfferNegotiationParty
extends AbstractNegotiationParty
    Basic voting implementation: this agent accepts and rejects offers with a 50% chance.

    The class was created as part of a series of agents used to understand the api better

    Author:
    David Festen

        Initializes a new instance of the RandomCounterOfferNegotiationParty class.
        Specified by:
        init in interface NegotiationParty
        Overrides:
        init in class AbstractNegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        utilitySpace - The utility space used by this class
        deadlines - The deadlines for this session
        timeline - The time line (if time deadline) for this session, can be null
        randomSeed - The seed that should be used for all randomization (to be reproducible)
        id - the AgentID.
